pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Bjontegaard_metricBjontegaard metric calculation. Include BD-PSNR and BD-rate.See `demo.py` for usage.References:* [1] G. Bjontegaard, Calculation of average PSNR differences between RD-curves (VCEG-M33)* [2] S. Pateux, J. Jung, An excel add-in for computing Bjontegaard metric and its evolution
